para.text: is the DOS/Windows folder that contains the project script file (extension WPJ), which is the file you select when opening a Walls project. This folder, by default, will also contain the associated survey data files (extension SRV); however, the latter can actually reside anywhere depending on their path properties. Beneath the project folder is a work folder (with the same base name as the WPJ file) containing the workfiles generated for this project.
